body: I got kicked for spawnkilling when I was in the hub, the date was march 11th and today its April 3rd.. I don't recall spawnkilling and if I did so, by accident. Also, is this in the right area? I have no idea.
body_tagged: I got kicked for spawnkilling when I was in the hub, the date was march 11th and today its April 3rd.. I don't recall spawnkilling and if I did so, by accident. Also, is this in the right area? I have no idea.
title: Confusion

replies.body: Yeah we know about this. It is a bug that is currently being fixed at the moment. Don't worry the infraction will be appealed and won't show up on your infractions page.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah we know about this. It is a bug that is currently being fixed at the moment. Don't worry the infraction will be appealed and won't show up on your infractions page.

replies.body:
Hey Tigger,

Yes this is one of the several small bugs from the recent update, where your past infractions repeat themselves on you, I am experiencing this as well. Don't worry, the punishments won't fill up your infraction page. :)
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Tigger,

Yes this is one of the several small bugs from the recent update, where your past infractions repeat themselves on you, I am experiencing this as well. Don't worry, the punishments won't fill up your infraction page. :)

replies.body: I was warned by 99250/Numbers/Peache 7 times for "Do not abuse glitches"
replies.body_tagged: I was warned by 99250/Numbers/Peache 7 times for "Do not abuse glitches"

replies.body: Kylo said it happens when the hub generates its stats. It's happens when the hub is close to restart. Currently there isn't a solution yet, but kylo is acknowledged about this and he tries his best to fix it. But there are also other bugs around and it could take a while it's fully fixed. Just wait :)
replies.body_tagged: Kylo said it happens when the hub generates its stats. It's happens when the hub is close to restart. Currently there isn't a solution yet, but kylo is acknowledged about this and he tries his best to fix it. But there are also other bugs around and it could take a while it's fully fixed. Just wait :)

replies.body: Yes, same happened to one of my alts! :D It got banned permanently for a reason (advertising) and I just got re-banned. But I could connect back.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, same happened to one of my alts! :D It got banned permanently for a reason (advertising) and I just got re-banned. But I could connect back.

replies.body: Thank you everyone for your replies. Its helpful to know it won't show up on my infraction page and that its a bug. Take your time in getting it fixed. :) ~ Sky
